title: Reverse Engineering Specialist (Java and iOS Focus)
description:
Reverse Engineering Specialist (Java and iOS Focus) – Contract
 



  





 We are urgently looking for a Reverse Engineer with deep expertise in iOS application analysis and reverse engineering.
 **This is not a typical Java developer role.** 
 We are specifically seeking someone who has hands-on experience disassembling, injecting, and analysing iOS apps using industry-standard tools.
 



 You will work on challenging technical problems that require a low-level understanding of application behaviour, traffic flow, and runtime manipulation, while also contributing to Java-based backend components and cloud infrastructure.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* Perform reverse engineering of iOS applications
* Analyse application behaviour using injection tools such as Frida
* Disassemble iOS apps using tools like Hex-Rays IDA
* Monitor and manipulate network traffic with tools like Charles Proxy
* Collaborate with developers and security engineers to uncover app logic and flows
* Support backend components written in Java
* Deploy and maintain infrastructure on AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
* Use Datadog for observability and monitoring



  





**Must-Have Skills:** 



* Proven experience with reverse engineering iOS applications
* Expertise with tools including or similar to:
* IDA Pro or Hex-Rays
* Frida or frida.re
* Charles Proxy or similar network traffic tools
* Strong understanding of runtime injection, hooking, and instrumentation
* Good working knowledge of Java
* Familiarity with AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, and Datadog



  





 Please apply if your skillset matches the requirements above.

title: Senior .NET-utvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Som Senior Utvecklare kommer du att spela en viktig roll i att utveckla avancerade lösningar med fokus på .Net-plattformen i Azure-miljö. Du kommer att arbeta med en fullstack-approach och använda teknologier som Node/React microfrontend, C#, och TypeScript. Din roll kommer att innefatta allt från mjukvaruarkitektur till integration med både synkrona och asynkrona mönster. En central del av ditt arbete kommer att vara att implementera och optimera lösningar inom AI, Agenter, Agentkluster och Maskininlärning.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Har ett genuint intresse för programmering och drivs av att förbättra användarupplevelsen
* Har minst 10 års erfarenhet av professionell mjukvaruutveckling.
* Goda kunskaper inom .NET | AzureDevOps 2022
* Goda kunskaper i SQL och Rabbit MQ
* Har vana av att arbeta agilt (Scrum och/eller SAFe)


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 23-06-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Gjensidige är ett av Nordens ledande försäkringsbolag och ett av de största bolagen noterade på Oslo Börs. Vi är verksamma i Sverige, Norge och Danmark och har totalt cirka 4000 medarbetare. I Sverige etablerades Gjensidige Försäkring år 2007. Här är vi cirka 250 medarbetare placerade i Stockholm, Luleå, Malmö och Gävle och erbjuder försäkringsprodukter till privatpersoner och företag. Vi säkrar liv, hälsa och värden med utgångspunkt i vår vision "Vi ska känna kunden bäst och bry oss mest". Gjensidige använder den senaste tekniken för att vara ledande inom branschen, inklusive omfattande användning av molnplattformar.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Vi söker nu en erfaren Backendutvecklare som ska utveckla och underhålla våra digitala tjänster och produkter. Du har ett starkt intresse för modern utvecklingspraxis, CI/CD, molnplattformar, integrationer och API-design och du kommer att vara med och bidra till tekniska beslut inom arkitektur och design. Du vill vara en central del av vår teknikmiljö och bidra till att utveckla innovativa och stabila lösningar för våra kunder. Hos oss samarbetar vi nära andra utvecklare, designers och produktteam.
   

  

**Teknikstack**
* Backend: Java, Kotlin
* DevOps och infrastruktur: CI/CD, Azure, Kafka
* API och integrationer: REST, mikrotjänstearkitektur


**Om dig**
* Du har en genuin passion för programmering och har arbetat som utvecklare i minst 3 år
* Du har solid förståelse för programvaruarkitektur och god kodkvalitet
* Du är nyfiken, initiativrik och samarbetar bra i team
* Du har erfarenhet av molnplattformar och moderna utvecklingsverktyg
* Du behärskar både svenska och engelska väl, skriftligt och muntligt


 Du kommer att bli en del av vår interna kompetensmiljö, där vi regelbundet arrangerar forum, workshops, tech-days och andra evenemang för att öka vår kompetens och ständigt utvecklas. Vi vill att du aktivt delar med dig av din kunskap, lär dig och skapar goda förutsättningar för allas utveckling. Dessutom bidrar du till en humoristisk och generös arbetsmiljö, både i ditt team och i hela Gjensidige. Det är viktigt för oss! Våra applikationer och tjänster körs på vår egen molnplattform; gap.gjensidige.io/
   

  

**Vilka är vi?**
 Hos oss får du möjlighet att vara med och bidra till Gjensidiges tillväxtresa på den svenska marknaden i en kultur som präglas av våra tre kärnvärden – Bygg trygghet, Tänk nytt och Ta sats. Vår ambition är att bli det mest kundorienterade bolaget i Norden. Vår arbetsplats präglas av en mix av åldrar, erfarenhet och bakgrund och vi sitter i fräscha lokaler centralt belägna. Inspiration, utveckling och leveranser är centralt i vårt ledarskap. Vi arbetar ständigt med att förbättra vår verksamhet och leverera maximal kundnytta. Detta gör vi genom att se lösningar i stället för problem och ha ett stort nätverk inom hela organisationen. Du kommer vara en del av ett team som kännetecknas av högt engagemang, innovativt tänkande och vilja att samarbeta för att lyckas.
   

  

 Vi arbetar aktivt med jämställdhet, mångfald och hållbarhet som en viktig del av vår försäkringsverksamhet och i arbetet med våra kunder och samarbetspartners. Gjensidige tar ansvar och vill bidra till en bättre värld med ett socialt engagemang för ett tryggare samhälle.
   

  

**Låter det intressant?** 
 Skicka in din ansökan senast 2025-06-20. Vi kommer att intervjua kandidater löpande, så vänta inte med att höra av dig. Har du frågor är du varmt välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Jan Østerhus - Jan.Osterhus@gjensidige.no

title: DBA
description:
*Vi söker en
 **Databasadministratör** 
 som vill bli en del av Iver för att bidra till bättre IT-lösningar som gör skillnad för våra kunder! Är du vår nya kollega?*
*Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside* 
*you”, ”behind* 
*you” och ”before* 
*you”. Vi kallar det för ”The Iver way”.*
**Om Iver**
 Iver är en ledande nordisk helhetsleverantör av molnbaserade IT-tjänster med spetskompetens inom drift, cybersäkerhet, cloud och innovation. Våra tjänster är kritiska inte bara för våra kunder – utan för digitaliseringen av samhället i stort.
   

  

 Med huvudkontor i Stockholm verkar Iver främst i Norden med en agenda att fortsätta expandera. Iver omsätter drygt 3 miljarder SEK och har cirka 1 500 anställda som arbetar på ett av våra 25 kontor i Norden.
   

  

**Din roll på Iver?**
 I rollen som DBA blir du en del av Ivers affärsområde
 **Bank&Fintech** 
 med ansvar för Ivers tjänsteleverans av cybersäkerhetstjänster och drift för kunder med särskilda säkerhetskrav. Bank&Fintech kunder är ofta stora nordiska fintech företag eller myndigheter med krav på hög nivå av informationssäkerhet där vissa av dem utgör samhällskritisk verksamhet och har en särskild hotbild.
   

  

 Du kommer att vara en del av ett team om ca 35 personer med ansvar för drift och plattformsutveckling gentemot en specifik kund. Kunden är ett teknikdrivet och branschledande fintechbolag med höga krav på informationssäkerhet. Du kommer få en viktig roll där du är drivande i arbetet med att ta fram nya lösningar och guida kunden framåt och du arbetar i nära dialog med kunden för ständig förbättring och effektivisering.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna involverar klassiskt DBA arbete med att förbättra databasplattformarna, rådgiva utvecklare och operations, blandat med datawarehouse, dataanalys, ML/AI arbete & strategier. Vi strävar efter att modernisera arbetet kring databaser, därtill kommer man också arbeta i Kubernetes miljöer med t.ex. Git, Grafana, Prometheus där databaserna även har sin plats.
   

  

 DBA-teamet i sig består idag utav 5 personer, där man även arbetar tillsammans med utvecklare, operations och datanalytiker. Teamet driver projekt där de utforskar nya tekniker och implementerar kontinuerligt nya lösningar i Ivers plattformar. Teamet arbetar agilt och strukturerat i de olika projekten tillsammans med kund. I den här rollen har du goda möjligheter att utforma din roll efter vad du tycker är intressant.
   

  

 Vi arbetar bland annat med tekniker/metoder som Kubernetes, Linux, DB2, IaC, CI/CD, Bash, Python, GitOps, Grafana, Prometheus och Go.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
**Iver - We empower our Nordic society.**
 På Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Vi är inkluderande och strävar efter ett genuint samarbete mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi finns här för att inspirera dig till att nå dina yrkesmässiga mål. Vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden.
   

  

 Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 Vi söker dig som är en lagspelare med ett stort tekniskt intresse och som har en vilja att förstå hur saker fungerar i grund och botten. Som person är du prestigelös, ansvarstagande och har en förmåga att förmedla lösningar på problem. Du gillar nära samarbeten mellan utveckling, kunder och operations där dina åsikter och kunskaper bidrar till teamens gemensamma mål.
   

  

 Vi tror att Cybersäkerhet är ett område du finner intressant och du ser behovet av att förstå komplexa system, deras sårbarheter och att ständigt utveckla dessa. Du har förutom en viss erfarenhet av DB2, även erfarenhet av andra databaser (Postgres, Redis m.m.) samt god erfarenhet av att arbeta med Linux. Vidare behärskar du ett eller flera script/programmeringsspråk samt har kunskap av Git.
   

  

**Placeringsort**
 Iver finns på 25 platser i Sverige & Norge. För denna tjänst är du placerad på Ivers huvudkontor i Solna.
   

  

**Övrig Information**
 Vi har kunder inom alla branscher och sektorer inklusive säkerhetsklassad verksamhet därför genomför vi bakgrundskontroller i samtliga av våra rekryteringsprocesser.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag: 2025-05-01. Du är välkommen att kontakta rekryterande chef Joacim (joacim.forsman@iver.se) vid frågor kring tjänsten.

title: Senior UX Designer – med affärsdriv och strategiskt tänk
description:
Är du en erfaren UX-designer som brinner för att skapa användarupplevelser som gör verklig skillnad – både för användaren och för affären? Vi söker nu en Senior UX Designer som vill ta en strategisk och affärsnära roll i ett engagerat designteam med stort inflytande över både användarupplevelse och affärsutveckling.

### **Om rollen**


I den här rollen får du möjlighet att arbeta med både externa och interna digitala lösningar – allt från kommersiella webbplatser till interna plattformar och partnerverktyg. Ditt fokus kommer att ligga på att förbättra kundresor, driva engagemang och *designa lösningar som skapar konkret affärsnytta*.


Du arbetar nära utvecklingsteam, affärsstakeholders, marknadsfunktioner och andra UX-designers – i en miljö där *samarbete, kommersiellt tänk och användarcentrering* står i centrum.

### **Exempel på arbetsuppgifter**

* Utveckla och implementera UX-strategier kopplade till övergripande affärsmål

* Genomföra research och analys av användarbeteenden med fokus på konvertering, retention eller effektivisering

* Skapa customer journeys och service blueprints för att identifiera förbättringsområden


-Designa användarvänliga gränssnitt som stödjer både användar- och affärsbehov

* Leda workshops och co-creation-sessioner med tvärfunktionella team

* Coacha andra UX-designers och bidra till att höja UX-mognaden i organisationen


### **Vi söker dig som har**

* 5+ års erfarenhet inom UX eller produktdesign

* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att driva designprocesser från research till leverans

* Stark förmåga att koppla UX-arbete till affärsstrategier och kommersiella mål

* Kompetens inom service design, design thinking och customer journey mapping

* Vana att kommunicera med olika stakeholders, inklusive produktägare, marknad och affärsutveckling

* Tidigare erfarenhet av större organisationer, gärna inom B2B-miljöer


**Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av agila team och digitala plattformar

* Förståelse för konverteringsoptimering och datadrivet designarbete


-Erfarenhet av responsiva webbapplikationer eller samarbete med marknads- och growthteam


### **Varför du ska söka**


Här får du inte bara jobba med UX på djupet – utan också vara en del av en organisation där UX ses som en strategisk del av affären. Du får möjlighet att påverka på riktigt och bidra till digitala lösningar som både engagerar användare och driver affärsresultat.


Ansök direkt eller hör av dig om du vill veta mer – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Researcher in Human-System Interaction
company: RISE Research Institutes of Sweden AB
description:
**About us**  

RISE Research Institutes of Sweden is Sweden’s research institute and innovation partner. With over 3,000 employees, we collaborate closely with industry, academia, and the public sector to strengthen Swedish competitiveness and contribute to a more sustainable society.


We are now looking for a dedicated Researcher in Human-System Interaction to join our Transformation of Industry unit, part of the Prototyping Societies department. Prototyping Societies is a department within the Digital Systems division at RISE. We are about 135 colleagues located in nine sites in Sweden, from Piteå in the north to Lund in the south. We conduct research and innovation at the intersection of people and technology, with a strong humanistic perspective. The department brings together a diverse range of expertise and backgrounds, creating a unique and multidisciplinary environment for addressing today’s complex societal challenges.

**About the Role**
  

As a Researcher, you will take an active role in designing and conducting applied research, with a primary focus on the interaction between humans and AI-based systems. You will contribute to different stages of the research process and may also lead specific activities. The work is primarily carried out in industrial contexts, such as the automotive and process industries, but may also include projects related to the public sector.
  

  

You will contribute to design-driven research projects, where creative exploration and user-centered approaches are central to generating new knowledge and solutions. A key part of your role will be to develop design concepts and prototypes. Your work may also include tasks such as data collection and analysis, documenting and presenting results, and supporting the development of new project ideas and funding proposals.


In addition, your work may include:  

  

* Conducting technology scouting and trend analysis
* Exploring user needs and challenges
* Leading or participating in user studies
* Contributing to scientific publications and conference presentations

You will be employed in a unit based in Piteå. While some flexibility exists, the work is primarily carried out on-site, as many activities and projects benefit from a physical presence.  

  

**Who are you?**  

We are looking for someone with an independent, curiosity-driven, and solution-oriented mindset. You’re passionate about shaping future user experiences and exploring emerging technologies. You communicate well and enjoy collaborating across teams and engaging with partners outside the organization.  

  

Required qualifications:

* A master’s degree in Interaction Design, Industrial Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a closely related field.
* Demonstrated experience working with emerging technologies such as extended reality (XR), artificial intelligence (AI), or Human-Robot Interaction (HRI).
* Experience in UX/UI design for complex systems, preferably in collaboration with the automotive, process, or manufacturing industry.
* Comfortable using various digital design and prototyping tools, such as Figma, Adobe CC, Unity, or comparable software.
* Strong communication skills in English, both written and verbal.
* Category B driving license.


It is considered a merit if you are able to communicate in Swedish and have an interest in or competence related to sound or acoustics.

**Are we a good match?**  

Join a forward-thinking team at the intersection of design, technology, and research. You will work on user-centered, future-oriented projects involving technologies such as AI and XR, in close collaboration with leading industry partners across various sectors.  

  

**Welcome with your application!**  

If this sounds interesting and you want to know more, please contact hiring manager Anna Sirkka, +46 10 228 44 34. Selection and interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis. Last day of application is July 5th.  

  

Our union representatives are Ingemar Petermann, SACO, +46 10 228 41 22 and Linda Ikatti, Unionen, +46 10 516 51 61.

title: Praktik / internship inom Front-end HT/VT 2025-2026
description:
**Vendre är en av Sveriges snabbast växande e-handelsplattformar . Vi är ett techbolag som dagligen utvecklar vår plattform för att nå nya tillväxtmål, och en fortsatt ökande kundbas. I Vendre så bygger våra kunder sin egna webbshop, och tillsammans omsätter våra kunder över en 1,5 miljarder genom plattformen Vendre.**


Nu vill vi ge dig som pluggar **inom webbutveckling & front-end** möjlighet att bli en del av Vendres team under din praktikperiod.


Du kommer att få vara en del av vårt produkt team. Här arbetar vi med att bygga och vidareutveckla e-handeln tillsammans med våra kunder. Under din praktikperiod kommer du få möjligheten att delta i projekt med butiker i flertalet branscher samt möjlighet att välja mellan flera olika intressanta ämnen. Vårt mål är att lära dig så mycket som möjligt och gemensamt bygga din kunskapsbas och CV framåt. Såvida vi trivs med varandra vill vi gärna att du gör båda dina praktikperioder hos oss. Vårt gemensamma mål är såklart att du stannar kvar hos oss efter din praktik!

 **Vi tror att du:**

* Letar efter en praktikplats/internship för hösten/våren 2025-2026. **OBS Vi kan tidigast ta emot praktikanter från den 27 oktober i år.** Börjar din praktik tidigare än det får vi tyvärr be dig att skicka din ansökan till en annan arbetsplats.
* Genomgår eller har genomgått utbildning på yrkeshögskola eller högre
* Har kunskaper inom HTML & SCSS
* Har förståelse för och kan skriva JavaScript i ramverk som React eller Vue
* Har grundläggande förståelse för hur data hämtas från API:er
* Har någon typ av backend erfarenhet inom PHP, Node eller dylikt

### **Din praktik hos oss**


På praktiken jobbar du först med att bygga upp din egen butik på Vendres e-handelsplattform. Därifrån lär får du lära dig att bygga moduler som kan användas av riktiga kunder. Du kommer att ingå i ett team på ungefär 8 personer där både din handledare och andra utvecklare är med. Läs mer HÄR för att höra vad vår tidigare praktikant Mika säger.


Kodgranskningar tillsammans, kodmöten och parprogrammering kommer vara en viktig del av din praktik.


Du får feedback på din kod och det finns alltid någon att fråga. Här finns bra dokumentation, snälla kollegor och massa kunskap att ta del av.

### **Att jobba hos Vendre ‍**


Vendre är en marknadsledande e-handelsplattform med smarta och användarvänliga lösningar som du gärna får läsa mer om HÄR. Bland våra kunder finns Ur & Penn, Micki leksaker, Ströms, Geggamoja, mStore samt en mängd taggade entreprenörer som du snart kommer att höra mer om samt arbeta tillsammans med.


Hos oss jobbar ett handplockat team med kompetens inom systemutveckling, UX, design, marknad, försäljning och projektledning – alla specialiserade inom e-handel.


Vi tycker att vi har en personlig och vänlig kultur, vilken vi är måna om att bibehålla även när vi växer. Även om rutiner är viktigt så är inte ena dagen den andra lik. Repetitivt är inte vår melodi och i en föränderlig bransch är det bra att uppskatta variation, nya tankar och idéer. Något som däremot upprepar sig är att det finns regelbundna frukostar, fikor och massor med snacks. Och för den som önskar finns det många tillfällen att träna, dricka bubbel, fika eller spela spel tillsammans.


Den 6 juli stänger vi ansökan, så sök NU


**För att söka och kvalificera:**

 **KODUPPGIFT**  

På vår hemsida vill vi visa en lista över våra anställda (dummydata). Data kan hittas på följande slutpunkt: https://dummyjson.com/users?limit=6&skip=0
  

  

Bonuspoäng om du lägger till paginering enligt hur api:n fungerar.  

För att få sida2: https://dummyjson.com/users?limit=6&skip=6  

  

Dessa är några måsten enligt designteamet:

* Runda profilbilder
* Namnet, följt av en kontaktlänk som leder till de anställdas e-postadress
* Responsiv design
* Utöver det kan du designa sidan hur du vill
* 

Vi vill att du använder Vue som ramverk.

**PRESENTATIONSVIDEO**


Spela in en kort video med din telefon (30sek - 1min lång) och berätta varför du:

* Tycker Front-end är spännande
* Vill göra din praktik hos Vendre
  
* 
* 

  

**NÄR DU ÄR KLAR MED BÅDA UPPGIFTERNA**


* Ladda upp ditt projekt på Github
* Skicka länken till jennifer@vendre.se
* Vi vill även ha länk till deployat projekt i mejlet så att vi kan se det live (github pages eller netlify tex).
* Bifoga även din presentationsvideo i mejlet.


**DEADLINE ÄR 6 JULI**

Går du vidare kommer jag höra av mig till dig och boka in en personlig intervju.

  

Lycka till

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
We know it, you know it. Most companies ramble on about purpose and making the world a better place. And pretty often it feels a bit… well, forced. But we’d like to think that our story is special for real.


Our founders, Shadi Bitar and Ninos Malki, came to Sweden from Syria when they were kids. Books became their compass, guiding them through the maze of life, and helping them shape their destinies in a new world.


Their dream was bold: What if they could unlock the world of books for everyone, making knowledge and inspiration accessible to all? Fast forward a few years, and the tale of Nextory was born.


At Nextory, we've crafted a revolutionary monthly subscription that empowers our users to devour books like never before, be it through reading or listening. It's not just a product; it's a passport to endless adventure and enlightenment.  

  

**WHY THIS ROLE MATTERS**


We’re building intelligent, intuitive features that make discovering the perfect book feel like magic. That means scaling:

  

AI librarian, our multi-agentic book recommender with chat interface


Content-based recommendations that understand who you are and what you love


Semantic search, powered by language models and vector retrieval

  



To bring these to life, we need someone who writes clean, production-ready Python, loves experimenting with real-world data, and wants to see their work impact millions of readers. This isn’t just about training models - it’s about designing systems that deliver them reliably, efficiently, and at scale.

 **WHAT YOU WILL DO**

Ship ML-powered features to production with real user impact


Build and optimize end-to-end ML pipelines for training, serving, and inference


Develop recommendation models using book metadata, embeddings, and behavioral signals


Contribute to our AI librarian's brain —integrating ranking, retrieval, and personalization


Work closely with engineers, product, and data scientists in a tight feedback loop


Integrate models into low-latency APIs and monitor their performance


Ensure systems are robust, scalable, and tested—not just clever in theory  

  

**OUR STACK**

**Languages:** Python, SQL  

**Cloud & MLOps:** GCP (Vertex AI, BigQuery), Vertex AI Pipelines  

**Search & Retrieval:** Vertex AI Search, Matching Engine  

**Infra & Observability:** Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, GCP Monitoring

**SKILLS AND QUALIFICATIONS**


 3+ years of experience as an ML or Software Engineer working on ML systems  

  

 Strong Python skills - your code is clean, maintainable, and production-ready  

  

 Experience deploying models in real-world environments (not just notebooks)


 Hands-on experience with end-to-end ML pipelines (training, evaluation, serving)


 Experience with version control, testing, and CI/CD for ML models


 Understanding of model evaluation, A/B testing, and performance metrics


 Strong problem-solving and debugging skills


 Effective communication and collaboration with cross-functional teams


 Understanding of ML pipelines, APIs, and model serving at scale


 Familiarity with cloud-native tooling (bonus for GCP + Vertex AI)


 You’re collaborative, pragmatic, and care about impact more than ego


**BONUS IF YOU HAVE**

Experience building and shipping recommendation systems (collaborative filtering or content-based), semantic search, or chat interfaces


Passionate about personalization, conversational UX, or storytelling


Hands-on experience with natural language processing (NLU and NLG), LLMs and RAG


Familiarity with GCP services, especially Vertex AI, BigQuery, and Cloud Storage


You actually enjoy reading (not required, but you’ll fit right in)


Hands-on experience with (multi-)agent systems)  

  

Come join a team that’s using machine learning to make the world a little wiser, happier, and more inspired - one book at a time.

 **WORK ENVIRONMENT AND IMPORTANT DETAILS**


At Nextory, we believe a strong and inclusive culture is key to our success - and that culture flourishes when we meet and collaborate in person as much as possible. That’s why we spend the majority of the working time at our beautiful office!


We are based in Stockholm, Sweden, with offices in Paris and Bangalore. Our hybrid work policy includes four days in the office and Wednesdays as a work-from-home day.


Please note that we do not offer relocation and that a six-month probationary period applies.

title: Technical Designer - ARC Raiders
description:
We are looking for a Technical Designer to join ARC Raiders game teams here at Embark, a team that is currently numbering ~100 developers.


In this role you will be responsible for the technical design work by creating, implementing, and maintaining tools, systems, & other workflows as a bridge between design and code.


You will collaborate closely with the Design Director and other Designers of the project, as well as Production leadership helping in articulating and establishing estimates, project scope and timelines.

 **Example of responsibilities**

* Help design and prove new features by developing prototypes for the design team to experiment with
* Help identify technical pitfalls and challenges in our designs, offering possible solutions or alternatives
* Contribute tool and workflow improvement ideas, especially design tools
* Help design, balance, and tweak our more technical gameplay systems, for example activity spawning or loot distribution
* Work with other disciplines to help align design intent with non-design pipelines and tech

**We would love if you have**

* Around 5+ years of experience within technical design making games
* A good grasp of AAA PvP/PvE gameplay and systems design, including player psychology, UX design, and gameplay mechanics & dynamics
* Proficiency with the Unreal Engine and experience in scripting and blueprints
* Knowledge of the UnrealEngine-Angelscript plugin is a big plus, but not required
* Knowledge of programming languages such as C#, Lua, or Python
* A creative and curious mind
* A good knowledge or familiarity with other game making disciplines such as animation, UX, 3D Art, etc.
* A great creative collaborator in cross disciplinary groups
* Professional English communication skills

  

At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.  

  

We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.  

  

Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.  

  

Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: Product Manager Insurance
description:
**Sambla Group is a fintech company with a clear goal – to make loans better for all. We need you, your ambition and your skills on our journey. We have become the fast-growing fintech company that we are today - bridging the gap between borrowers and lenders - thanks to all the 300+ amazing people who work here.**

**Our success is the result of the commitment to deliver the best customer journey and consumer finance products in the industry. Our vision is to democratize lending and empower customers to improve their personal finances. Through our well known brands such as Sambla, Advisa, Rahalaitos, Omalaina, Rahoitu and DigiFinans we support customers in consolidating and getting the best terms on their loans.**

**Own and scale a core product with huge potential**


We’re looking for a Product Manager to take full ownership of our Insurance product - one of Sambla Group’s key growth areas. You’ll report directly to the Head of Products and take lead in owning the roadmap, strategy and performance, with a focus on growing recurring revenue, improving retention, and building long-term customer relationships through relevant products and digital experiences.


Insurance is already a high-performing product at Sambla Group, generating over 200 MSEK in annual revenue, and we’ve just migrated to a new platform to support the next phase of growth. You’ll step in at a pivotal moment, with a solid foundation in place and a clear mandate to scale, innovate and elevate the customer experience. We’re now strengthening the team around the product with more capacity in other areas of the company - and this is your opportunity to shape what comes next.

**What you’ll do**

* Own and lead the insurance roadmap, strategy and KPIs
* Drive initiatives that increase monthly paying users, retention and lifetime value
* Build customer journeys that combine strong UX with partner alignment and compliance
* Work cross-functionally and help shape team processes that enable efficient delivery
* Contribute to Sambla Group’s broader product portfolio and expansion strategy

 **What we’re looking for**

* A driven doer with strong product instincts and a hands-on mindset
* Someone who thrives in a high-performing, fast-moving environment
* Data-informed, structured and user-focused mindset
* Strong communication skills
* Fluent in English (Nordic language is a plus)

 **Why this role**

* High ownership and clear impact
* Strong team around you - with devs, analyst, QA/coordinator
* Strategic, yet hands-on
* Direct influence on a growing product and future expansion

  


**What we offer:**

* Business in mind & people at heart – we deliver results together and celebrate our achievements.
* A varied and challenging role in a multinational and highly innovative company, where we value the development of our employees
* We are strong believers in creating a fun workplace where people enjoy coming to work.
* A friendly culture with openness and respect for one another, with the possibility to influence and make a difference on society and people’s everyday lives.  

  

Please note!
  

As part of our efforts to foster an unbiased recruitment process, we kindly encourage you to not include picture, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation or age in your CV.

title: Middle UX/UI Designer
description:
Impulse is a brain training app that helps people keep their brains sharp with bite-sized fun games and logic puzzles. Impulse is the world’s most downloaded app in the Brain Training category with over 100 million downloads. The app is trusted by users worldwide, with a 4.7 rating on the App Store, and has been featured as App of the Day in over 50 countries, including the UK, Canada, and Australia.


Impulse is a part of Headway Inc, a global tech company that revolutionizes lifelong learning by creating digital products for over 150 million users worldwide. Our mission is to help people grow. We’re proud to be ranked 4th among the World’s Top EdTech Сompanies by TIME magazine.

  

The core of our achievements is our team. That’s why, together with Viktoriia, Product Lead at Impulse, we’re looking for **a Middle UX/UI Designer** to join our team of superstars.

### **This job is perfect for you if you want to:**

* **Build and grow new directions** for a product that's already thriving. You’ll be the key Product Designer driving the Android and Mobile Web experiences — improving, scaling, and evolving them with the team.
* **Work with driven, experienced teammates.** You’ll be side-by-side with specialists from all areas, brainstorming, testing, and constantly exchanging ideas and knowledge.
* **Experiment boldly.** You’ll run lots of tests and quickly see the results of your work in action.
* **Keep improving and growing.** Our focus is continuously optimising conversion rates — from the first ad view to subscription — while keeping the user experience clean and thoughtful. We’re all about evolving, rethinking, and aiming higher together.

### **What you will do:**

* Design and refine UI/UX for Android and Mobile Web.
* Collaborate with product managers, designers, developers, and analysts to generate and test hypotheses.
* Create interactive prototypes and interface animations.
* Take part in user interviews to understand needs and improve UX.
* Prepare design materials for development handoff and support implementation.
* Keep an eye on mobile design trends and apply best practices.

### **What do you need to join us:**

* 3+ years of commercial experience in Mobile app design.
* Hands-on experience designing for Android.
* Solid skills in Figma (design systems, prototyping, responsive layouts).
* Strong understanding of UX/UI principles.
* Ability to prepare clean design handoffs for developers.
* Familiarity with design systems and component libraries.
* English at Intermediate+ level.
* Proactive mindset with a willingness to generate and discuss new ideas.
* Ability to work in a dynamic environment.
* Ownership mindset and eagerness to actively contribute to product growth.
* Alignment with the values of our team (more about us - here).

### **What do we offer:**

* Work within an ambitious team on a socially impactful education product.
* An office with a reliable shelter, generators, satellite internet, and other amenities.
* Access to our corporate knowledge base and professional communities.
* Personal development plan.
* Compensation for English language learning, external training, and courses.
* Medical insurance and full sick leave compensation.
* Company doctor and massage in the office.
* Sports activities: running, yoga, boxing, and more.
* Corporate holidays.
* Supporting initiatives that help Ukraine. Find out more about our projects here.

### **Working schedule**


This is a full-time position with a hybrid remote option. It means that you can decide for yourself: whether you want to work from the office, remotely, or combine these options.

**Are you interested?**

**Send your CV!**

title: UX/UI Designer
description:
At Bending Spoons, we’re striving to build one of the all-time great companies. A company that serves a huge number of customers. A company where team members grow to their full potential. A company that functions at unparalleled levels of effectiveness and efficiency. A company that creates value for shareowners at an extraordinary rate. And a company that does so while adhering to high ethical standards.
   

  

 To achieve this objective, we execute the following strategy: We acquire a digital business with untapped potential and make it as successful as we can by leveraging our platform—which comprises our expertise, technologies, data, brand, talents, and company culture. Then, we invest the proceeds into making our platform more powerful, and into acquiring new businesses. Thus, our strategy sees us combine an investor’s attention to capital allocation with the hands-on approach of an operator.
   

  

 For a talented, driven, and collaborative individual, working at Bending Spoons is an opportunity to learn, make an impact, and progress their career at an exceptionally high rate. That’s our promise to such a candidate.
   

  

**A few examples of your responsibilities** 
* Help shape outstanding user experiences and impact the success of our products by creating flawless UI and UX designs, from conceptualization to delivery. You’ll take a human-first approach to designing products, ensuring they delight users by being as effective as they are aesthetically pleasing.
* Make use of prototyping tools to ensure your designs are intuitive and to explore new, innovative ways of designing interactions.
* Work closely with product managers and software engineers to propose new features and improve the quality of both mobile and desktop apps.
* Focus on user testing and research to ensure our customers are always at the core of our product designs.
* Find, together with engineers, the most efficient trade-off between high-value solutions for users and the complexity of implementation.
* Leverage usage data to evaluate the impact of your designs, and apply your learnings to the next iterations.


**What we look for** 
* **Reasoning ability.** 
 Given the necessary knowledge, you can solve complex problems. You think from first principles, and structure your ideas sharply. You resist the influence of biases. You identify and take care of the details that matter.
* **Drive.** 
 You’re extremely ambitious in everything you do—and your initiative, effort, and tenacity match the intensity of your ambition. You feel deeply responsible for your work. You hold yourself to a high—and rising—bar.
* **Team spirit.** 
 You give generously and without the expectation of receiving in return. You support the best idea, not your idea. You're always happy to get your hands dirty to help your team. You’re reliable, honest, and transparent.
* **Proficiency in English.** 
 You read, write, and speak proficiently in English.


**What we offer** 
* **Incredibly talented, entrepreneurial teams.** 
 You’ll work in small, result-oriented, autonomous teams alongside some of the brightest people in your field.
* **An exceptional opportunity for growth.** 
 We go to great lengths to hire individuals of outstanding potential—then, our priority is to put them in the ideal position to thrive. Spooners in their 20s lead products worth hundreds of millions of dollars. And if you’ve got what it takes, you’ll soon be playing an essential role in major projects, too.
* **Competitive pay and access to equity in the company.** 
 Typically, we offer an individual at the start of their career a salary of £54,545 in the UK and €52,246 elsewhere. If they possess a few years of relevant experience, the salary on offer tends to be between £66,779 and £149,636 in the UK, and €63,965 and €143,330 elsewhere. Pay grows rapidly as you accumulate experience and translate it into greater impact. You can also receive some of your pay in company equity at a discounted price, thus participating in the value creation we achieve together. If relocating to Italy, you may enjoy a 50% tax cut.
* **All. These. Benefits.** 
 Flexible hours, remote working, unlimited backing for learning and training, top-of-the-market health insurance, a rich relocation package, generous parental support, and a yearly retreat to a stunning location. We help each Spooner set up the conditions to do their best work.


**Commitment & contract**
 Permanent or fixed-term. Full-time.
   

  

**Location**
 Milan (Italy), London (UK) or remote.
   

  

**Before you apply**
 Bending Spoons is a demanding environment: We're extremely ambitious and we ask a lot of ourselves and one another. While this tends to lead to fantastic learning, achievements, and career growth, it also requires a significant commitment. So if you like the role and are ready to give your very best, don't hesitate to apply.
   

  

**The selection process**
 If you pass our screening, we’ll ask you to take on a few tests that assess how you approach unfamiliar problems. If you’re successful with those, we’ll invite you to a series of interviews.
   

  

 Bending Spoons is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We consider for employment any applicant and we provide reasonable accommodations for an applicant with disabilities, which can be requested through this form.
   

  

 Studies suggest that women tend not to apply for a job if their CV isn’t a perfect fit. Here, talent takes precedence over experience. So if you like the role and think you could be awesome at it in time, go ahead and apply.

title: Designer
description:
We’re Valtech RADON, an award-winning hybrid creative agency, part of the Valtech family. If you are interested in joining our team, you are welcome to apply with your resume.
   

  

 At Valtech RADON, we combine creative, strategy, craft, and media with Valtech's business transformation skills to build remarkable brands across all touchpoints. We work with some of the world’s most recognizable brands – including Pantene, Ericsson, Husqvarna, and Head&Shoulders, and Nordic brands like RFSU, Halebop and Byggmax.
   

  

 We’re the second home to 50+ people spanning 10+ nationalities (and many more backgrounds, experiences, and places we've called home). Our office is in Stockholm, Sweden, but we work with brands worldwide and welcome applicants from all over the world.
   

  

**The opportunity**
 At Valtech, you’ll find an environment designed for continuous learning, meaningful impact, and professional growth. Whether you're pioneering new digital solutions, challenging conventional thinking or building the next generation of customer experiences, your work will help transform industries.
   

  

**We Are Proud Of**
* The work we do and the innovation we drive
* Our values of share, care and dare
* A workplace culture that fosters creativity, diversity and autonomy
* Our borderless, global framework, which enables seamless collaboration


**The role**
 As a Designer, you are passionate about experience innovation and eager to push the boundaries of what’s possible. You bring 2 years of experience, a growth mindset and a drive to make a lasting impact.
   

  

 We’re seeking a talented designer who seamlessly blends traditional graphic design skills with prompt engineering for AI tools. You're well-versed in AI platforms like Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, and Figma AI, and you maintain proficiency in the Adobe Creative Suite.
   

  

 You likely have a foundation in traditional graphic design but are deeply engaged with the industry's rapid evolution. Your keen eye for design and creative mindset enable you to craft effective prompts, iterating them to perfection. AI is an integral part of your workflow, serving both as an idea generator and a production partner.
   

  

 In this entry-to-mid-level role, you'll be a vital member of our creative department, pushing technological boundaries while collaborating with designers and creatives specializing in advertising, PR, and film.
   

  

**Role Responsibilities**
* Create a variety of work for campaigns and brands.
* Collaborate closely with other designers, motion designers, film directors, and the rest of the creative team
* Work with design presentations for various pitches.
* Be part of building, challenging, and expanding our brand within the field of design.


**Must Have Qualifications**
 To be considered for this role, you must meet the following essential qualifications:
   

  

* Have a solid portfolio of projects and at least 2 years of experience.
* A hybrid creative. You understand and are comfortable in the traditional advertising channels, but don’t limit your creativity to that expression. You’re embracing new technology and are eager to take brand creativity to places and spaces it hasn’t been before.
* Experienced using AI image and video generation tools
* The ability to refine prompts to align with brand ideas, tone, and style
* Hungry. We’re looking for someone with the ambition to be a part of making V\_RADON a top agency globally
* Split vision. You can work on several projects at the same time.
* Thrive in a fast-paced environment.
* Great work ethic and holds no prestige.


**If you do not meet all the listed qualifications or have gaps in your experience, we still encourage you to apply. At Valtech, we recognize that talent comes in many forms, and we value diverse perspectives and a willingness to learn.**
**Commitment to reaching all kinds of people**
 We design experiences that work for all kinds of people - and that starts with our own teams. At Valtech, we’re intentional about building an inclusive culture where everyone feels supported to grow, thrive and achieve their goals. No matter your background, you belong here. Explore our Diversity & Inclusion site to see how we’re creating a more equitable Valtech for all.
   

  

**Your application process**
 Once you apply, our Talent Acquisition team will review your application. If your skills and experience align with the role, we’ll reach out for next steps.
   

  

 ⚠️ Beware of recruitment fraud: Only engage with official Valtech email addresses ending in @valtech.com.
   

  

 We are committed to inclusion and accessibility. If you need reasonable accommodations during the interview process, please either indicate it in your application or let your Talent Partner know.
   

  

**About Valtech**
 Valtech is the experience innovation company that exists to unlock a better way to experience the world. By blending crafts, categories, and cultures, we help brands unlock new value in an increasingly digital world.
   

  

 At the intersection of data, AI, creativity, and technology, we drive transformation for leading organizations, including L’Oréal, Mars, Audi, P&G, Volkswagen Dolby, and more.
   

  

 At Valtech, we don’t just talk about transformation. We make it happen. Our people are the heart of our success, and we foster a workplace where everyone has the support to thrive, grow and innovate.
   

  

 Are you ready to create what’s next? Join us.

title: iOS Internship - HealthTech Startup Revolutionizing Sleep
description:
In line with what leading scientists say today:
 
*“The most powerful biohack is getting a good night’s sleep,”* 

 we’re committed to developing the most effective natural sleep enhancement technology in the world.
 




  





**Introduction:** 




  






 Are you passionate about creating innovative mobile experiences that can impact global health? Join us in revolutionizing sleep health with cutting-edge technology as an iOS Intern. We’re looking for a motivated, curious intern to work closely with our founding team on building what will become the most effective medically certified solution for improved sleep.
 




  





**About Us:** 




  






 We are a dynamic health tech startup, focused on addressing the widespread issue of poor sleep quality that affects billions worldwide. Our mission is to develop groundbreaking solutions that enhance sleep by using leading technology, including the latest advancements in wearables, AI, and scientific insights. If you’re passionate about improving sleep health and want hands-on experience in an early-stage startup, we want you on this journey.
 




  





**The Role:** 




  






 As our
 
**iOS Intern** 

 , you will:
 



* Participate in iOS App Development: Support in designing, building, and maintaining Swift code for our iOS app.
* Biometric Data Integration: Work with frameworks like HealthKit, CoreMotion, etc., to collect and process real-time biometric data.
* Real-Time Data Processing: Assist in implementing and testing algorithms for real-time data use.
* UI/UX Implementation: Help ensure a smooth, intuitive user experience following Apple’s design guidelines.
* Performance Optimization: Learn how to tune performance and optimize user experience.
* Testing and Debugging: Write unit tests and debug issues alongside our QA team.
* Collaboration: Participate in cross-functional teamwork with engineers, designers, and machine learning experts.
* Stay Updated: Follow the latest iOS trends and contribute new ideas to the team.



  





**About You:** 



* Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
* Experience or coursework in Swift and iOS development (UIKit, CoreData, etc.)
* Eager to learn about Apple Watch, HealthKit, and real-time data frameworks
* Familiar with REST APIs and working with cloud services
* Strong interest in UI/UX design and Apple Human Interface Guidelines
* Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
* Curious, proactive, and passionate about health tech and mobile innovation



  





**Preferred Qualifications:** 



* Experience with audio frameworks (CoreAudio) is a plus
* Basic understanding of machine learning concepts
* Exposure to cross-platform frameworks like React Native is a bonus



  





**What We Offer:** 



* A meaningful internship role in a high-impact mission
* Mentorship and collaboration with a passionate founding team
* An opportunity to work on real product development from day one
* Flexibility, autonomy, and insight into startup culture
* Possibility of full-time opportunities post-internship



  





**Apply:** 




  






 Ready to make a difference in global sleep health? Please send us your application. We’re eager to embark on this impactful journey with you!
 




  






 The internship is unpaid but may lead to future employment incl. equity.

title: Senior Product Designer, Design System Team
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We are looking for a
 **Senior Product Designer** 
 to join our
 **Design System Team** 
 within the Central Team. The Central team focuses on providing one north star experience to all our customers at Wolt. You'll be collaborating closely with research, motion, content design, as well as the operation team. Also, with product managers and engineers to ensure that our design system supports their needs and aligns with our brand guidelines and design principles.
   

  

 This will be someone who has mastered the craft of turning insights into beautifully designed products, who can inspire organisations through prototyping and storytelling to ensure their final work has maximum impact for the customer. We hope that you have strong visual design and interaction design skills, and must be an excellent communicator in order to support designers who are using the system and to align and collaborate with them on the evolution of the system.
   

  

 📍This role can be based in our tech hub in Berlin, Helsinki or Stockholm.
   

  

 What you’ll be doing
   

  

 Day-to-day in this role you’ll:
   

  

* Bring clarity to chaos — Take vague, early-stage ideas and transform them into tangible concepts, prototypes, and product directions.
* Design for both sides of the platform — Contribute to consumer-facing features as well as merchant tools, understanding how each influences the other.
* Create exceptional UI and interaction design — You’ll raise the bar on polish, accessibility, and visual storytelling in every flow and screen.
* Think strategically — Work closely with engineers to ensure the efficient and effective implementation of the system and collaborate with designers to help them identify and create design solutions, new elements, and components that adhere to the system.


 Our humble expectations
   

  

* You’ve shipped high-quality product design at scale — You have 7+ years of experience designing digital products, ideally in both consumer and Saas environments.
* You have exceptional visual and interaction craft — You obsess over typography, layout, and UI nuance, and your portfolio shows delightful, high-polish experiences.
* You think in systems, not just screens — You consider edge cases, build flexible design systems, and push for consistency with creativity.
* You’re a creative thinker with strong product intuition — You don’t wait for specs. You explore, frame problems clearly, and propose new angles others might miss.
* You communicate with impact — Whether through Figma, a prototype, or storytelling in a meeting, you help others see the vision and move towards it together.


 What we offer
   

  

* We listen deeply — The better we understand our users, the better our solutions. We design with empathy, not ego.
* We collaborate widely — Designers work closely with engineers, PMs, data, and operations to shape practical and scalable solutions.
* We own the problems — We don’t just design screens—we help define the problem, lead the discovery, and guide the product forward.
* We imagine boldly — We think from first principles, then work backward to make magic real. We prototype, test, and iterate fast.


 Next steps
   

  

 As a next step,
 **we’d love to take a look at your portfolio** 
 to get a better sense of your experience and design approach. We’re particularly interested in seeing how you tackle challenges, make design decisions, and create impact across different user needs and platforms. Work that demonstrates
 **strong visual craft,** 
 thoughtful problem-solving, and clear evolution over time is especially valuable to us. If you have any high-fidelity prototypes or motion work that bring your designs to life, that’s always a great bonus.
   

  

 https://youtu.be/GoL541\_xj9w
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Senior Product Designer, Support Team
description:
**About Wolt**
 At Wolt, we create technology that brings joy, simplicity and earnings to the neighborhoods of the world. In 2014 we started with delivery of restaurant food. Now we’re building the delivery of (almost) everything and you’ll find us in over 500 cities in 30 countries around the world. In 2022 we joined forces with DoorDash and together we keep on dreaming big and expanding across the globe.
   

  

 Working at Wolt isn’t always easy, but it’s definitely exciting. Here you’ll learn more, build more, and ship more than in most other companies. You’ll be challenged a lot, but also have a lot of fun on the way. So, if you’re a self-starter with drive and entrepreneurial spirit, this could be the ride of your life.
   

  

 We’re hiring
 **Senior Product Designers at Wolt** 
 across several exciting product areas:
   

  

* Consumer – You'll shape the core experience that millions of users rely on daily to discover, order, and enjoy their favorite meals and essentials—delivering delight at every tap.
* Merchant – You’ll build tools that help local businesses succeed on the Wolt platform, from order management to insights and growth levers—empowering merchants at scale.
* Courier – You’ll design experiences for the people who make Wolt run—our courier partners. From onboarding to daily logistics, your work will help make every delivery seamless.
* Central – You’ll create the systems, platforms, and tools that power Wolt behind the scenes—unlocking scale, speed, and smarter decisions across the company.


 Each team offers a chance to tackle unique design challenges with real-world impact.
   

  

 📍The roles are based in our tech hub in Stockholm.
   

  

**You’re excited about this opportunity because:**
* You care deeply about creating experiences that empower businesses and improve everyday life for merchants, couriers, and consumers.
* You lead with empathy, always designing with the user in mind.
* You thrive in complex, ambiguous problem spaces—and enjoy bringing structure, clarity, and direction.
* You hold a high bar for your craft, from concept to pixel—creating designs that are scalable, thoughtful, and beautiful.


**What you’ll be doing:**
* Turn ambiguity into clarity. You’ll bring strong framing and product thinking to shape undefined problems into compelling design opportunities.
* Bring ideas to life beautifully. You’ll design intuitive interfaces and interactions that are both delightful and highly usable.
* Prototype to inspire. Through prototyping, storytelling, and systems thinking, you’ll align teams and build momentum—ensuring your work not only ships, but resonates.
* Own the full design stack. From strategy and exploration to refined visuals, you’ll lead high-impact initiatives from start to finish.


**Who you are:**
 We’d love to work with you if:
   

  

* You have 4+ years of experience designing consumer, B2B, or SaaS products—building elegant, business-savvy solutions in complex environments.
* You’re a T-shaped designer with deep strengths in concepting, visual design and prototyping, able to drive high-quality outcomes in a collaborative, cross-functional team.
* You think in systems, not just screens—comfortable designing across diverse journeys and touchpoints.
* You’re a creative problem-solver, excited by ambiguity and energized by complex design challenges.
* You’re open to feedback—comfortable sharing early, learning fast, and evolving ideas with your team.
* You’re a strong communicator and natural storyteller, able to align stakeholders, build empathy, and drive design-led decisions.


**Next steps**
 As a next step, we’d love to see your
 **portfolio** 
 to better understand your design approach and impact. We’re especially interested in work that shows
 **strong visual craft** 
 ,
 **attention to detail** 
 , and
 **real results** 
 . One well-structured Figma file with your best, recent work is more valuable to us than multiple outdated case studies — products move fast, and relevance matters. If you have
 **high-fidelity prototypes** 
 or
 **motion work** 
 , even better. We're excited to see how you think and build.
   

  

 Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion
   

  

 We’re committed to growing and empowering a more inclusive community within our company, industry, and cities. That’s why we hire and cultivate diverse teams of people from all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives. We believe that true innovation happens when everyone has room at the table and the tools, resources, and opportunity to excel.

title: Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)
description:
**Job Description**
**Strategic Product Manager/Head of Product Management - Tietoevry Banking (m/f/d)**
 We are looking for a
 **Strategic Product Manager** 
 who wants to be part of Tietoevry Banking. Tietoevry Banking is the leading financial services software and solution partner in the Nordics. We offer modular, pre-integrated banking as a service solutions and market-leading software for core, payments, credit, cards, financial fraud, and wealth. With our scale, expertise, and specialization, we empower financial institutions to enhance agility, efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
   

  

**When joining Tietoevry Banking you will work on:**
* Product Vision and Strategy: Develop and communicate a clear product vision and mid-term/long-term strategy that aligns with the company's overall Strategy, objectives and market trends. Define target customers, licensing and pricing models to address predictable long-term revenue flow. Define complementary services to support successful implementation and maintenance, ensure additional revenue flow.
* Market Analysis: Conduct in-depth market research to understand industry trends, competitive landscape, regulatory changes and customer needs, providing input and recommendations for strategic decisions for mid-term and long-term initiatives. Identify opportunities for product innovation and differentiation.
* Roadmap Development: Ability to translate market needs and business opportunities to a strategic roadmap and balance long/short-term needs. Create and maintain a high-level product roadmap that outlines key milestones, deliverables, and timelines, ensuring alignment with business priorities. Address product lifecycles, including planning sunsetting and migration strategies. Define innovation inception approaches. Plan portfolio modernization to fit market needs, ensure future growth and competitive costs.
* Relationship Building: Establish and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential clients, partners, and industry influencers to create new business opportunities. Participate, present and be influencer in conferences, industry workgroups. Build relationships with industry stakeholders globally. Demonstrate cultural awareness and the ability to adapt product strategies to various regional requirements.
* Stakeholder management: Collaborate closely with the sales team and engage with other departments, including engineering, marketing, project management and customer teams, to support with sales and ensure successful product development and launch. Cooperate cross-units in Cards and Transaction Banking and other units in Banking.
* Customer Insights: Prepare and present vision, pitches, and presentations to existing and potential clients and partners, effectively communicating the value proposition. Gather and analyze customer feedback and usage data to inform product decisions and enhance user experience.
* Performance Metrics: Define and track key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure product success and identify areas for improvement, ensure data-based decision making. Keep accountability on product/service profitability. Align models and use cross unit template and processes.
* Go-to-Market Strategy: Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop and execute effective go-to-market strategies for product launches and updates. Collaborate with Security, Compliance and Privacy teams to identify market or country potential risks and opportunities.
* Risk Management: Identify potential risks and develop mitigation strategies to ensure successful product delivery and adoption.
* Leadership and Mentorship: Provide guidance and mentorship to product managers and team members, fostering a culture of innovation and continuous improvement.


**Who we are looking for:**
* A Bachelor's degree in business, Marketing, or a related field; MBA or advanced degree preferred.
* Proven experience in product management, with a focus on strategic planning and execution.
* Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to make data-driven decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to influence and collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.
* Experience in Cards and Payments, with a large network of connections with industry experts and decision-makers.
* Familiarity with European and Nordic customers.


**We also believe you have:**
* Strong strategic thinking skills to develop and implement effective product strategies.
* A market and customer focus that drives product innovation and meets customer needs.
* Excellent relationship-building abilities to establish connections with clients, partners, and industry stakeholders.
* Proficiency in public speaking to effectively present ideas and influence audiences.
* Strong negotiation and influencing skills to advocate for product initiatives and secure buy-in.
* A creative mindset that fosters innovation and the development of unique solutions.
* A results-oriented approach that emphasizes accountability and achievement of product goals.


 As a person, we believe you are a team player who takes action and demonstrates responsibility to organize your work and solve your tasks. With our agile end-to-end development process, you will continue to both learn from and coach your colleagues, so communication is important for us. Technology is developing fast, so learning new cutting-edge technologies is something you strive to do.
   

  

**What we offer:**
* We offer you professional growth, meaningful projects, an open culture, and an outstanding work-life balance!
* We provide a flexible hybrid work model as part of our culture and way of working.
* Competitive salary (up to 7,000 EUR gross per month in Latvia), based on experience and qualifications.
* Finally, we believe in curiosity and learning as a lifestyle where you need to unlearn and relearn every day as new possibilities emerge.


**Did we get you inspired?**
 We look forward to your application! Interviews will be held continuously, so we encourage you to apply today! For more information or questions, please contact the Talent Acquisition team at recruitmentinbanking@tietoevry.com.
   

  

 Hope to hear from you soon!
   

  

 Location: Rīga - Verde, Roberta Hirša 1
   

  

*On specific positions, we might perform background checks.*
**About Tietoevry**
 Tietoevry creates purposeful technology that reinvents the world for good. We are a leading technology company with a strong Nordic heritage and global capabilities. Based on our core values of openness, trust, and diversity, we work with our customers to develop digital futures where businesses, societies, and humanity thrive.
   

  

 Our 24,000 experts globally specialize in cloud, data, and software, serving thousands of enterprise and public-sector customers in more than 90 countries. Tietoevry’s annual turnover is approximately EUR 3 billion, and the company’s shares are listed on the NASDAQ exchange in Helsinki and Stockholm, as well as on Oslo Børs. Familiarize yourself with what we do.
   

  

 Additional Information
   

  

 At Tietoevry, we believe in the power of diversity, equity, and inclusion. We encourage applicants of all backgrounds, genders (m/f/d), and walks of life to join our team, as we believe that this fosters an inspiring workplace and fuels innovation. Our commitment to openness, trust, and diversity is at the heart of our mission to create digital futures that benefit businesses, societies, and humanity.
   

  

 Diversity, equity and inclusion (tietoevry.com)

title: Senior UX Researcher
description:
**Description**
*Position at LeoVegas Group*
**About The Role**
 We’re looking for a Senior UX Researcher to join our Product Discovery Design team, where you’ll play a vital role in shaping product direction through deep user insight. Working alongside product managers, designers, data analysts, and the Research & Insights team, you’ll lead exploratory and evaluative research that uncovers user needs and behaviors across the entire journey.
   

  

 You’ll contribute to ongoing and upcoming roadmap initiatives by running usability tests, conducting concept validation, and identifying feature opportunities. Your work will directly influence design concepts, product strategy, and business decisions through continuous collaboration and storytelling. This is an exciting opportunity for someone passionate about embedding research into fast-paced product development while building meaningful experiences for real users.
   

  

 YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:
   

  

* Plan and execute user research to uncover user needs, behaviors, and opportunities across the product journey
* Conduct usability tests, concept validations, and desirability studies during pre-development phases
* Translate insights into clear, actionable direction for product and design teams through continuous storytelling and collaboration
* Collaborate closely with designers, product managers, and the Research & Insights team to align on goals and testing approaches
* Apply formative and generative research methods such as card sorting, tree testing, and remote usability testing
* Support product roadmap development by identifying and validating new features, navigation flows, and user experience improvements
* Track and communicate the impact of research on product decisions and business outcomes


 OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING:
   

  

**Essential Skills**
* 5+ years of experience in UX research, with strong expertise in qualitative exploratory and evaluative methods
* Proven ability to plan, conduct, and communicate user research across different stages of the product lifecycle
* Strong storytelling and communication skills to share insights in a compelling, actionable way
* Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams including design, product, and engineering


 Nice to Have
   

  

* Experience with remote testing tools and methods such as card sorting and tree testing
* Background working in fast-paced, international, or highly collaborative environments


**Who We Are**
 At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Hybrid work policy
* 4 weeks of Workation (T&C apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enroll in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts
* We offer a relocation package with accommodation and flights.


 In our pride, we empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait for things to happen; we pounce and make it happen!
   

  

 Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!
   

  

 \*\*As our company working language is English, we’d like to see your CV in English, please\*\*
